title: The BluePrint Series: A Fireside Chat with Rich Tu

introduction.heading: INTRODUCTION OF THIS EVENT
introduction.content: Join us for an exclusive evening with Rich Tu, the award-winning designer behind the official NY/NJ 2026 FIFA World Cup poster, and a creative powerhouse known for his work with Nike, MTV, and culture-shaping campaigns across the globe.

agenda.title: WELCOME AND OPENING

eventDetails.content: Presented as part of The Gradient's Blueprint Series, this fireside chat-moderated by Love Malone, CEO of The Gradientâ€”will dive into Rich's creative journey, his thoughts on where the industry is headed, and how design continues to shape identity, storytelling, and the future of culture.
